title: is elementalist lux worth it
body: i just bought 50$ of rp and wondering if elementalist lux is worth it

replies.body: 100% she jokes about how nobody wards.
Do you play a lot of Lux?  If the answer is yes, then it is worth it.  The skin is pretty good and worth owning if you play her often.
I would only buy that skin if I were a Lux one trick honestly. That being said the skin itself is very worth it.

Worth _what?_

Why is "worth it" becoming a vague, meaningless and context-free phrase these last couple years?
And people in general deferring all personal-preference decisions that are meaningless to anyone but them to random people on the internet. Is this a side-effect of social media?

It is a pay2win skin, you almost can see her Q though. i suggest you buy it

also good quotes and particles
